original: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena
analyzed: magga saccena ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena

original: saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā
analyzed: saṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatana saṅgahena saṅgahitā

original: dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: dhātu saṅgahena saṅgahitā te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihā āyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā

original: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekena āyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā
anañña ataññassāmi iti indriyena ye dhammā

original: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: hetūhi ca iva sa hetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā

original: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: hetūhi ca iva hetu sampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā

original: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: kilesehi ca iva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā

original: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
analyzed: kilesehi ca iva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā

original: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā
analyzed: kilesehi ca iva kilesa sampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitā

original: āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena
analyzed: āyatana saṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātu saṅgahena saṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena

original: saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi
analyzed: saṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena saṅgahitā te dhammāḥ katihi khandhehi

original: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekena āyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā
